ygData.subject: RE: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It wasn t the which weapons are good for Bards topic I was wishing to avoid, but instead a thread where people debate which weapons are worth what prices
ygData.messageBody:
> Now wait a minute. How in the world is a discussion of
> which weapons are good for bards off topic???

It wasn't the "which weapons are good for Bards" topic I was wishing to
avoid, but instead a thread where people debate which weapons are worth what
prices as that's not so much Bard related and there's no easy answer since
some people value things more than other people will. Thus I was more trying
to avoid any arguments. If that discussion isn't off topic, then ignore me.
(grin)
